name: The Epsilon Valley
description:
The levels of contamination on the valley has caused the apparition of trash monsters causing people and animals to displace from their homes.

it's now your chance to clean this mess!

Warning: There are some issues with Mozilla Firefox, try another web browser if possible.

Feedback form: https://forms.gle/cZscWVZ4qerBCm4z8

-- Controls --

Pause: ESC

Movement: W A S D

Aim: MOUSE

Dodge: Movement + SPACE

Jump: LEFT SHIFT

Main Shoot: LEFT CLICK

Secondary Shoot: RIGHT CLICK

Switch Weapon: MOUSE SCROLL


-- Third Party Assets --

RPG Poly Pack - Lite [Gigel - Unity Asset Store]

Battle in the Moonlight [スエノブ - Dova-Syndorme]

Toy Writter Mop [Yuta ONE - @yuta_ptv]
